actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of $1,034,000 for sea-grant program grants (proposed deferral D75-94) contained in the President's message of November 26, 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives to the proposed deferral of $1,034,000 for sea-grant (proposed deferral) D75-94) contained in the President's message of November 26, 1974.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of $1,034,000 for sea-grant program grants (proposed deferral D75-94) contained in the President's message of November 26, 1974.
